A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a series of cheap\, sometimes interesting visuals and dramatic tension\, but it's like spray painting dog poo. You can accent it with color and trick the casual viewer for a second\, but if you spend anytime looking at it you will see it for what it truly is\, a steaming pile poo and disrespectful and shameless attempt to profit from fans like some cheap suckers. This film is incoherent and vacuous of compelling plot and characters overall.
